item.dc:creator: @juggalofamilyinc juggalofamilyinc
item.description:
@juggalofamilyinc wrote:

umm i don’t think that spawning a monster gives it HP, why don’t you try this…

you already changed the hp so cool, now open your autospawn.cfg file

and anywhere add the kbd in there … just find it’s id from npc.cfg and give it coordinates, height = 0, walktype = 1,

EDIT: yeah … lol

@madmax40 wrote:

When i change my npc.cfg files , say for example;

kbd hp is 0 i change to 300 , save , compile , log in , spawn a kbd and nothing happens.

help please? , the compiler is working but doesnt have any effect.
